channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Train vs Pedestrian - Fatality; INC#1506; 09:13PM; 662 S Alvarado St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3weLF6z; #Westlake; Firefighters responded to the Metro B (Red) Line station to find one person had been fatally struck by a train. Firefighters will assist LAPD and Medical Examiner with the body recovery. Unknown age/gender/circumstances. Nothing further.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC13 E11 E13 E20 E209 E211 E220 E9 EM1 HR3 RA11 SQ21 T11 T20 T9; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0193; 09:21AM; 1416 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xgPvBF; #DowntownLA; Firefighters continued operating in defensive mode for several hours, knocking back flare ups from adjacent rooftops, and protecting the neighboring buildings. The commercial building contained large amounts of clothing/textiles while burned readily and continued to fuel the fire. The roof partially collapsed part way through the incident, and firefighters maintained their strategies, waiting for the rest to collapse and give hose streams a straight shot at the burning materials beneath. Remote Suppression firefighting vehicle "RS3" was used to enter the unstable structure and gain access to better suppression angles and deeper penetration. Overall, it took 120 firefighters 4 hours and 12 minutes to extinguish the flames, however much of the debris within the rubble contains extremely hot spots that will need to be uncovered by LAFD Heavy Equipment. Thankfully, there were no reported injuries. Fire Investigators are on scene conducting a fire-cause investigation.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 AR11 AR14 AR22 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E14 E15 E2 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E220 E221 E226 E294 E3 E63 E66 E9 E95 EA1 EM11 EX2 HE4 HE5 HR3 PI4 RA10 RA3 RA803 RA810 RS3 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T10 T11 T15 T20 T21 T26 T3 T9 T94 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 13 15; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire 04/05/2024 INC#0193

item.description: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0193; 06:46AM; 1416 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xgPvBF; #DowntownLA; Firefighters continue to fight this commercial fire in defensive mode. A heavy fire load (reported as clothing/textiles) and a mezzanine inside have contributed to the fire behavior. The building has sustained a partial roof collapse. Firefighters have established positions on adjacent buildings on either side using hand lines to keep the flames at bay, but due to the condition of the building, this will be an extended operation. Crews are prioritizing the neighboring buildings, and will need to bring in LAFD Heavy Equipment crews to finalize extinguishment later this morning. So far, there have been no reported injuries. MOTORISTS: Avoid Main Street, near 14th St & 15th St (street closed due to fire apparatus).; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 AR14 AR22 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E14 E15 E2 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E221 E226 E3 E9 E95 EA1 EM11 HE4 HE5 HR3 PI4 RA10 RA3 RA803 RA810 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T10 T11 T15 T21 T26 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0193; 05:09AM; 1416 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xgPvBF; #DowntownLA; One-story commercial (approx 50’x100’) with heavy fire. Defensive mode. PIO Firefighter David Ortiz is en route. ; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E14 E15 E2 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E221 E226 E3 E9 E95 EA1 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA3 RA803 RA810 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T10 T11 T15 T21 T26 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13 15; Nicholas Prange

Update Structure Fire; INC#1300; 08:01PM; 730 W 30th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JqVJ53; #UniversityPark; LAFD responded to an LAPD operation where someone had barricaded themself inside of a home. LAFD staged outside to wait for LAPD to clear the scene. The smoke seen at first has now ceased and dissipated without LAFD involvement. Firefighters/paramedics remain on scene as an agency assist to support the ongoing LAPD operation. Refer additional questions to LAPD. Nothing further.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 BC13 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E210 E215 E46 EM11 RA10 RA15 RA815 SO1 SQ21 T10 T15 TL2 TM1 TM5; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1300; 06:34PM; 730 W 30th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JqVJ53; #UniversityPark; Two-story craftsman-style home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 E10 E14 E15 E210 E215 E46 RA15 RA815 SQ21 T10 T15; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0895; 02:19PM; 20251 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/43KraQW; #Winnetka; Firefighters found a *three-story* garden-style apartment complex with fire in one second-floor unit. Firefighters deployed hose lines to the unit and quickly extinguished the flames and keeping the fire from spreading vertically or horizontally. The apartment above was affected by smoke and the unit below was affected by water due to the necessary fire suppression efforts. It took 34 firefighters 19 minutes to extinguish the flames. One patient was assessed for minor smoke inhalation, but declined hospital transport. No firefighter injuries. ; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E104 E293 E72 E73 E84 RA104 RA872 SO1 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Boat Fire; INC#0862; 02:04PM; Berth 42; MAP: https://bit.ly/4am0JUe; #SanPedro; Forty firefighters responded by land and sea to the vessel on fire, described as an approximately 40-foot pleasure craft. Firefighters initiated marine firefighting tactics and extinguished the flames in 20 minutes, protecting the other nearby docked vessels. Unfortunately, the damage had already been done, and the vessel wound up sinking after the flames were extinguished. Two people (one adult male and one adult female) were found off site (away from the burning boat) with medical needs. Paramedics assessed both and both declined hospital transport. Cause under investigation.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT3 BT5 E248 E285 E36 E38 E48 RA112 T48 T85; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Boat Fire; INC#0862; 01:44PM; Berth 42; MAP: https://bit.ly/4am0JUe; #SanPedro; PRELIM: Approximately 40-foot watercraft with heavy fire showing, and at least one patient needing medical attention (but not requiring rescue). LAFD Firefighters are responding by land and sea.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT3 BT5 E248 E285 E36 E38 E48 T48 T85; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange
